articles.description: A penalty awarded to West Ham during Erik ten Hag's final match in charge of Man Utd was a 'misread', according to refereeing boss Howard Webb.
articles.title: Man Utd: VAR penalty decision in Erik ten Hag's final match was misread, says Howard Webb

articles.description: BBC Sport takes a look at the players interim boss Lee Carsley has fast-tracked into the England squad for the upcoming Nations League matches.
articles.title: England Nations League: Four inexperienced players 'auditioning' for Thomas Tuchel

articles.description: Rory McIlroy vows to retain DP World Tour events as a key part of his schedule next year while skipping some tournaments in America after an intense 2024.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy: 'I have to take care of myself' - world number three on reduced schedule

articles.description: Germany captain Joshua Kimmich says he and his team-mates should not have "expressed political opinions" at the 2022 World Cup in Qatar.
articles.title: Joshua Kimmich: Germany captain regrets Qatar World Cup protest

articles.description: How the inclusion of Katie Taylor v Amanda Serrano on the bill legitimises the carnival of Mike Tyson v Jake Paul in Texas
articles.title: Taylor vs Serrano rematch legitimises Tyson vs Paul carnival in Texas

articles.description: The news comes a day after confirmation that he will leave the BBC's Match of the Day.
articles.title: Gary Lineker steps down as BBC Sports Personality of the Year co-host

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz overcomes illness to defeat Andrey Rublev 6-3 7-6 (10-8) at the ATP Tour Finals in Turin.
articles.title: ATP Tour Finals: Carlos Alcaraz beats Andrey Rublev in Turin

articles.description: Steph Curry scores 37 points to guide the Golden State Warriors to victory - and spoil Klay Thompson's return with the Dallas Mavericks.
articles.title: Steph Curry steals show on Klay Thompson's return to Golden State Warriors

articles.description: A severe weather alert in southern Spain leads to the opening tie of the Billie Jean King Cup between Spain and Poland being postponed.
articles.title: Billie Jean King Cup 2024: Spain against Poland postponed after severe weather alert in Malaga

articles.description: Paul Craig says he was more excited by "fighting in front of Spiderman" than he would be Donald Trump as the Scot prepares to meet Bo Nickal at Madison Square Garden.
articles.title: UFC 309: Paul Craig 'more excited to fight before Spiderman than Trump'
